author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Today is August 4, in the two-thousand-and-twenty-fifth year of our Lord, and not a single person from the Obama-Biden regime has been arrested. However, the WNBA was able to track down and arrest the person who threw a neon green dildo on the court. So, like, at least the authorities are working for some people.

To recap how we got here, in the middle of a WNBA game between two teams who aren't the Indiana Fever (and therefore you haven't heard of them), the game had to be stopped for what, surprisingly enough, was only the second dumbest reason of the summer. An object was thrown on the court. A bright green object that was long and bulbous, and looked like a
title: Breathe easy, ladies! They hunted down and arrested the person who threw a neon green dildo on an WNBA court

author: Brodigan
description:
It’s that time of year! Time for a bunch of anachronistic hippies to go do drugs in the desert and set a giant statue on fire. Would any of us have imagined that the Burning Man attendees and staffers are a bunch of degenerates? A swamp witch was cast as Jesus Christ Superstar and we have video of the performance. Texas Democrats have fled the state to deny Republicans redistricting plans. Let’s take a walk down memory lane to see all the other times they’ve done this.

SYDNEY SWEENEY’S GUN SKILLS
title: 🔴 Watch! Texas Gerrymanders for Trump & Dems Freak: Racism or Good Politics?

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

There is supposed to be a vote in Texas today on a new congressional map that, if enacted, could give Republicans five seats that would be more competitive in for the 2026 midterm elections. To counter this, Texas Democrats are... running away. Yes, you guessed it, to "save democracy."

And they're running away to Illinois, a state that even with the new Texas map is more disproportionately gerrymandered.

It's not "anti-democracy" when Democrats do it.
title: Texas Democrats run away (again) to block redistricting, causing Texas Governor to make MASSIVE threat

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

I'm sure many of you slammed your laptop shut for the weekend saying to yourself, "Self, this Sydney Sweeney brouhaha (if I may invoke a little French) can't get any more ridiculous." WRONG! Because now the streets are saying she is a registered Republican, registered as one in 2024 in Florida, and both the President and Vice President of these United States of the Americas have commented on these developments.

Are there more important stories happening? Sure, I guess. Should we be covering one of those instead? Hey, these clicks don't bait themselves.

To recap, smokeshow of an actress Sydney Sweeney did an ad for American Eagles jeans where she a) looked hot, and b) made the same jeans vs genes pu
title: Sydney Sweeney OUTED as a registered Republican, while both Trump and JD Vance have thoughts on the matter
